name: My First Game (b0gget)
description:
I made a small game with phaser and javascript. It's nothing much, just a small game where you control a ball (or blood moon if you want to get creative) with WASD, and you can press E to spew out clones of yourself. This game will probably be updated in the future, but maybe not. I don't know!  (( You can also click the left mouse button anywhere to move the ball there immediately! ))

 Enjoy!
